Best Sellers Rank #110 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining)
#1 in Potato Mashers
Date First Available May 10, 2018

Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:03:21 UTC – Details)


This multi-functional tool from Farberware can serve as a meat chopper or potato masher, easily chopping and stirring ground meat, mashing soft cooked foods, and chopping and stirring fruit juice concentrates, frozen fruit, or homemade sauces and spreads. Made of BPA-free nylon, this chopped meat masher is heat resistant up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, making it safe for all of your hot foods.
Easily cook ground beef and ground turkey with this multi-functional meat chopper utensil
The 5-blade design lets this hamburger meat chopper double as a masher; Quickly mix and mash softer cooked foods, like potatoes, yams, pumpkin, squash, rutabagas, turnips, parsnips, carrots, apples, bananas, and more
Heat resistant: the oversized, BPA-free nylon head is heat resistant up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, making it a safe tool for cooking ground meat, potatoes, and other hot foods; Safe to use on all types of cookware including nonstick and coated
Easy to use: mash by pressing blades into cooked food until desired consistency is achieved; angled blades scrape the sides of bowls and pots while mixing and mashing
Easy to clean: dishwasher safe, making clean up quick and easy

BPA-free nylon head is heat resistant up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, making it safe for hot foods and for coated cookware.

Five blades let you quickly mash, mix, and chop and the angled blades easily scrape the sides of bowls and pots.

Specially designed handle offers comfort and control.

Read more

5
Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:03:21 UTC – Details)

item.title: UBeesize 67” Phone Tripod Stand & Selfie Stick Tripod, All in One Professional Cell Phone Tripod, Cellphone Tripod with Wireless Remote and Phone Holder, Compatible with All Phones/Cameras
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Amazing Maximum Height to 67in】With a minimum storage space to 20in, easy to carry when traveling, hiking or camping. Fully Extendable to 67in, allowing you to take photos of the whole family and capture the best moments.【Selfie Stick Tripod & Phone Tripod Stand】Switch freely between selfie stick mode and tripod ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.30 - $13.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:31:23 UTC – Details)



【Amazing Maximum Height to 67in】With a minimum storage space to 20in, easy to carry when traveling, hiking or camping. Fully Extendable to 67in, allowing you to take photos of the whole family and capture the best moments.
【Selfie Stick Tripod & Phone Tripod Stand】Switch freely between selfie stick mode and tripod stand mode. The tripod is applicable to any situation such as video shooting, group photos, vlogging, adventuring, and taking selfies. Plus, it works in landscape or portrait mode.
【Strong and Sturdy】Made of highly-durable aluminum-alloy material with stainless steel, ABS plastic, designed with base locking knob in the center to prevent tilting or wobbling. The most frequent issues occur at other selfie stick tripods are solved by our 67” tripod.
【Everything you Need in One Box】Supplied with both a phone holder for mobile phones and BC parts for Go pro as well as a Wireless Remote for long-distance control, this is the complete solution for the Content Creator. A do-everything, go-anywhere kit that’s been put together for today’s influencer and content creator: Youtuber, Instagrammer, Tiktoker, etc.
【Wide Compatibility】Universal phone Holder fits most smartphones with or without a case, compatible with Galaxy S9/S9 Plus/Note 8/S8/S8 Plus/S7 Edge/J7, Samsung, Huawei. With a universal 1/4 inch screw, it fits for the DSLR, SLR, action camera, webcam, camcorder.
【Perfect After-sale Service】UBeesize provides 24-month replacement service and lifetime friendly after-sales service. Any questions, feel free to contact our customer service staff.

4.5
Price: $24.30 - $13.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:31:23 UTC – Details)

Product Description

World Wide Application Garden Tools Set

KOTTO 4 Pack Pruner Shears Garden Cutter Clippers, Stainless Steel Sharp Pruner Secateurs, Professional Bypass Pruning Hand Tools Scissors Kit

[High-Quality Materials] – One piece chrome plated 3Cr13 stainless steel blades for high-strength use, easy to cut branches even wide to 3/4′.
[Labor-Saving] – Slightly curved scissors are ergonomically designed, and the embedded shock-absorbing spring applies pressure to branches during trimming, will save more effort.
[Comfort Handle] – The handle part of the pruning shears made by high-purity PP+TPR plastic, especially the hand grip is very comfortable, but also has strong toughness and strength.
[Exquisite Workmanship] – The blade has been sanded so deter tarnish and rust, its all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears would also help adjust the blades angle.
[Gardening Helper] – Looking for long-lived pruning shear, fruits shear, flower cutter? Those pruning shears could satisfy need of planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, greenhouse pruning.

Package Include:
3 pruner shears and 1 scissor
1 pruner shear 1 folding saw and 1 scissor
2 pruner shears and 1 scissor
3 bonsai scissors
2 garden loppers and 1 pruner shear

Storage Case:
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓

Quality : The blades of our shears gardening tools are made of high quality stainless steel that gives good precision and makes it easy to cut through branches. The ergonomic handle design reduces stress on your wrist and fits for small or big hands to ensure maximum cutting comfort and no-slip grip.
Material : The blade of these garden hand tools has been sanded to deter tarnish and rust, it’s all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears for gardening would also help adjust the blades angle too.
Comfort : The handle part of the garden scissors/pruning shears/gardening shears/garden clippers is made of high-purity PP+TPR plastic, making the handgrip very comfortable but also tough and strong.
Gardening Helper : These grass shears/pruning scissors/garden pruners could satisfy the need for planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, and greenhouse pruning.
Customer service : If you have any questions or issues regarding our product, please do not hesitate to send the seller a message through Amazon and we will respond within 24 hours.
Add-ons: We offer a pair of free protection gloves to protect your hands when doing gardening work.

Product Description

Client desktop delivers right-sized performance

USFF desktop with power-saving and space-saving.

The OptiPlex 7010, now delivers leading-edge technology and versatility to any business environment with the space-saving chassis.This Computer redefines small form factor desktop computers by going beyond small towers.

Specifications

Processor: Intel Core i5-3470S 2.9 GHz Turbo 3.6 GHz
Memory: 8GB DDR3
Storage: 240GB SSD
Optical driver: DVD
Port: USB 3.0, VGA, DisplayPort, RJ-45

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the OptiPlex 7010 like Dual DP ports, a VGA port, and an RJ-45 connection. Support multi display.

Powerful processor

Select from Intel Core i5-3470S 2.9 GHz Turbo 3.6 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 7010 for most user’s needs.

Robust storage and memory

Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, 8G DDR3 memory with Strictly selected particles.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

240 GB Solid state drive

The OptiPlex 7010 comes with 240G SSD support faster Boot speed and faster storage rates.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 7010 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

This Certified Refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, a minimum 91-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic box. Only select sellers who maintain a high-performance bar may offer Certified Refurbished products on Amazon.com.
Includes: USB Keyboard & Mouse, USB WIFI Adapter, Microsoft office 30 days free trail.
DisplayPort, VGA, USB 3.0, Headphone output, Microphone input, LAN
Operating System: Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit-Multi-Language Supports English/Spanish/French.

Product Description

WGGE WG-015 Professional crimping tool/Multi-Tool Wire Stripper and Cutter (Multi-Function Hand Tool)

This 8” Multi-Functional Wire Stripper is a redesigned and completely updated version from WGGE that performs even better in wiring projects.

W&G Global Electronics Inc.is dedicated to being the premium provider with the highest quality product with reliability, long service life, and exceptional performance. As the same time, we are a manufacturer too.

One-Handed Completion

Unlike conventional wire stripper, high carbon alloy steel lift-time with such accurate stripping. Unlike conventional wire stripper, high carbon alloy steel lift-time with such accurate stripping. Product Description

Out of Sight Power

High performance

The OptiPlex 790, now delivers leading-edge technology and versatility to any business environment with the space-saving Micro chassis.

Powerful, bulk storage.

Available with Intel Core CPU, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, OptiPlex 790 enables increased power and productivity.Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Specifications Processor: Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3GHz Storage: 500GB HDD Optical: DVDRW Port: USB 2.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 790 like DP port, a VGA port, and an RJ-45 connection.Support Dual display.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 4th Gen Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 790 for each user’s needs.

Rebust storage and memory

The combination of key integrated components allows this computer to excel at work, home or school. DDR3 RAM allows for efficient multi-tasking, and abundant hard drive space provides ample room to store files, apps, music and movies.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

Upgrade Bay

The OptiPlex 790 comes with DVDRW drive supports reading and writing DVD data.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 790 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

Dell 790 Intel I3 Dual-Core 3.3 GHz Processor

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

【Dog Clippers & Nail Grinder Used Alone & with Vacuum】Our pet clippers, paw trimmer and dog nail grinder can be used alone, don’t need to connect hose, you can trim your dog anywhere as these clippers are cordless. You also can use clipper with vacuum. Gives you the freedom to groom your pet anywhere in your home or even outside
【Low Noise Design】Our pet grooming vacuum’s noise only 60 dB. 3 adjustable suction levels to choose ,making your pet dogs feel relaxed and not be scared during grooming.
【Easy Empty Dustbin & Easy to Store】With a detachable 1.4L dust box, 25% more capacity than others,easy-to-empty, do not need to empty often during grooming. The removable dust cup is equipped with an easy empty lid for quick, mess-free empty after cleaning.The device is highlighted with space-saving feature, we provide storage boards and bags for easy storage.
【7 in 1 Pro Pet Grooming Kit】oneisall pet grooming kit with vacuum make home grooming easy.It includes 7 proven grooming tools.The grooming brush and the deshedding tool gently remove loose hair and making pet hair shiny and smooth while eliminating tangles. Electric clipper, dog paw trimmer and dog nail grinder provides excellent cutting. Give your pet a best grooming experience. Nozzle head and Cleaning brush can be used for collecting pet hair falling on the carpet, sofa and floor.

Product Description

Out of Sight Power

Inspired Design

The OptiPlex 7010 is designed to seamlessly integrate into the office environment.

With a robust chassis that has undergone intense Highly Accelerated Life testing, the OptiPlex 7010 is designed for ultimate durability and reliability.

Powerful, bulk storage.

Available with Intel Core i5-3470 processors, 16G ram, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, OptiPlex 7010 enables increased power and productivity.Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Specifications Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 3.2 GHz Turbo 3.6 GHz Memory: 16GB DDR3 Storage: 1TB SSD Optical: DVDRW Port: USB 3.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on The OptiPlex 7010 like DP ports, a VGA port, an RJ-45 connection Support Multi display.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 3rd Gen Intel Core i5-3470 3.2 GHz up to 3.6 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 7010 for each user’s needs.

Upgrade Bay

The OptiPlex 7010 comes with DVDRW drive supports reading and writing DVD data.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

High-performance memory

Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, Oversized 16G DDR3 memory with Strictly selected particles.

1TB Solid state drive

Compared with a hard disk driver, SSD provide fast storage rates and faster boot speed. In addition, this PC comes with 1TB SSD so that you can store more.

The product ships with all relevant accessories, a minimum 90-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic box. Only select sellers who maintain a high-performance bar may offer Certified Refurbished products on Amazon.com.
